Texto: 
fluid culture: negative
afb culture: negative
left pleural effusion with associated pleural thickening. consolidation of the left lower lobe presenting a round opacity with lung volume loss.
rounded atelectasis
pneumonia
malignancy/metastasis
lung collapse
complaints of productive cough. chest x-ray obtained showed a left pleural effusion with associated pleural thickening. patient underwent a ultrasound guided thorasentesis. chest ct and plain films obtained for follow up.
